events.body: For the sake of style consistency all executables names should be either quoted within the backticks or not quoted at all.

events.message:
docs: typos fixed

PR Title:
    docs: updated README.md to include link to repo, files list and
    description

PR Description:
    This fixes #8160 (partially), fixes #8161, see also PR #11971 and #14022

events.body:
Fixed typos pointed by @fanquake and @hebasto

PR Description should be:
        fixes #8160 (partially) with #14037, fixes #8161 (see also PR #11971 and #14022)

> For the sake of style consistency all executables names should be either quoted within the backticks or not quoted at all.

I meant `bitcoin-qt.exe` in the Running Windows section as well.

events.message: docs: bitcoin-qt.exe quoted as the others filenames

events.body: @laanwj I think all points now are checked. Anyway, I made a new PR #14167 with the aim to improve even more the documentation in tar packages.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#14167](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/14167.html) ([WIP] docs: improve linux tar packages by cisba)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

In [PR 14755](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/14755), I suggest to remove all instructions about running and instead link to the official docs, to avoid duplication. Currently in conflict with this PR. Review/comment requested.  
(Also related: #14639)
Closing this, given that #14167 includes these changes.
